content: WASHINGTON  June 15 The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to take up a challenge by Taiwan-based AU Optronics Corp to a $500 million criminal fine the company was ordered to pay in 2012 after a conviction for price-fixing in the market for liquid crystal display panels.
name: AU Optronics Corp
title: U.S. top court rejects AU Optronics over $500 million price-fixing fine

content: WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to take up a challenge by AU Optronics Corp to a $500 million criminal fine the Taiwan-based company was ordered to pay in 2012 after a conviction for price-fixing in the market for liquid crystal display panels.
name: AU Optronics Corp
title: Supreme Court rejects AU Optronics over $500 million price-fixing fine

content: WASHINGTON  June 15 The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to take up a challenge by AU Optronics Corp to a $500 million criminal fine the Taiwan-based company was ordered to pay in 2012 after a conviction for price-fixing in the market for liquid crystal display panels.
name: AU Optronics Corp
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. top court rejects AU Optronics over $500 million price-fixing fine

content: TAIPEI  Jan 29 Taiwan's AU Optronics Corp    the world's No.4 flat-panel maker  sees its shipments to decline on a quarter-on-quarter basis  due to seasonal factors  the company said Thursday.
name: AU Optronics Corp
title: Taiwan's AU Optronics sees shipment decline Q-on-Q
